Yellow 60 - #FFAE00.description:
Default

Yellow are notoriously difficult to make accessible. Our current yellow does not provide enough contrast on our Grey 100 background. Therefore, do not rely solely on this color to achieve accessibility objectives.

Yellow Green - #DDD933.description: The secondary color palette provide additional options for visuals. As examples, they can be used in tags, and in data visualizations. The default swatches in the color picker also use this palette.

xs.description: Spacing between form fieldgroup elements (label + fields, icons + text), spacing around the tooltip, context search padding and margins, tag padding.
